faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our kimono rental service
faq.q1: How long is the rental period?
faq.a1: We offer half-day (4 hours) and full-day (8 hours) packages. Extra hours are available at 100,000 VND/hour.
faq.q2: How far in advance should I book?
faq.a2: We recommend booking 1-2 days in advance, especially on weekends and holidays. Walk-ins are also welcome if kimonos are available.
faq.q3: Is hair styling included in the price?
faq.a3: Basic hair styling is included in Lace Kimono packages and above. For basic packages, hair styling is available as an add-on for 100,000 - 200,000 VND.
faq.q4: Can I wear the kimono outside?
faq.a4: Yes! You can wear the kimono to stroll the streets and take photos at tourist spots. We'll guide you on how to move comfortably.
faq.a5: Yes, we offer a professional photo package with 20 edited photos for 500,000 VND. Please book in advance.
faq.a6: Free cancellation 24 hours before. Cancellation within 24 hours incurs a 50% fee.
faq.a7: Yes, we have special sizes for various body types. Please let us know in advance so we can prepare.
faq.a8: Ticktoc Kimono Rental is located in District 1, HCMC - near famous landmarks like Notre-Dame Cathedral and the Central Post Office.

about.title: Premium Kimono Rental Service in Saigon
about.p1: Ticktoc Kimono Rental is the premier kimono rental shop in Ho Chi Minh City, bringing an authentic Japanese cultural experience to the heart of Saigon. With over 200 genuine kimonos imported directly from Japan, we offer a diverse selection from traditional to modern styles - suitable for women, men, and children.
about.p2: Our professional team will help you dress in a kimono properly, style your hair in a Japanese fashion, and recommend accessories - all within 30 minutes. Whether you want memorable photos, a stroll through Saigon, or attend a special event - Ticktoc Kimono is always ready to help you create unforgettable moments.
